Text: #G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have a small ALFRED device that is wearable and easy to carry with me.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have visual troubles.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to see my vital parameters myself on the phone.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive a reminder from ALFRED on all the things I need to bring with me when I leave the house.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that can be easily adapted for user that have hearing trouble.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to have ALFRED to be able to determine the user's heart rate.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive specific tips how to reduce my health impairments without medication.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to receive day and night rythm support with agenda reminders.
#G19# As a developer, I want to obtain Apps development support.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to know exactly what ALFRED does with my personal data, and share it only on my specific permission.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the accounting to be as simple and clear as Possible.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use only well-visible buttons.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED for touristic walks and indications with explanations on historical and cultural sights.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have the wearables with integrated sensors to look good and not to be stigmatizing.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see my training Performance.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact people from my own circle.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an introduction conversation with ALFRED, so that I can learn everything about him and he about me.
#G19# As a developer, I want to have the API components to be on a high level so that I don’t have to deal with their details.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have ALFRED to remind me to keep a good body posture.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to decide who has access to my vital data.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to be able to see whether I already have taken my pills, so that I can avoid an overdose.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to use ALFRED to contact help in case of an emergency.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that speaks very slowly and clearly.
#G19# As a MedicalCaregiver, I want to use video calls in case of emergency.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that informs me about a low battery when leaving the house.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to always keep control on the activities of ALFRED.
#G19# As an OlderPerson, I want to have an ALFRED device that responds to the changing demand of the users by offering new Apps in the ALFREDO platform.
